Name: No Mans Land
About the game: NoMansLand No Mans Land is a poly art Zombie Survival game. You can craft, loot and shoot your way around the map. Play alone, or with a group of people. Choose how you lived your life previously, and make your way into a new life, living along side the zombies. Just remember to sleep with one eye open! Craft! Craft up to 40 different items including -weapons -fortifications -food -drink -health items and many many more! Explore! Explore a vast and changing landscape as you wonder through Candigo City. Explore the industrial district, the marina, the Military outpost and many other locations Survive Your ultimate goal is to survive! You have no other option, its you or them! Fight for your survival, make allies but never let anyone close enough to kill you! Its you, your gear and your instinct that will keep you alive.
